name: Form•Z Script
summary: Learn about .FSL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When a script is complete, it is compiled into a binary representation in a .FSB file, which is read by form•Z.

description: Script written in the form•Z scripting language (FSL), a plugin development language for form•Z 3D solids and surfaces modeling software; uses syntax similar to the C programming language but is more simplified; can use functions specified in the FSL API.
